duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the daily operations of the pastoral team to ensure positive and meaningful interactions with listeners, strengthening audience connection to Christ.
Lead the Pastoral team, including hiring, staff development, and functional role leadership.
Develop and execute comprehensive pastoral strategies aligned with EMF’s mission.
Provide pastoral and biblical counsel to listeners via phone on a variety of life topics.
Contribute to an environment in which the EMF Ministry Department will grow as the K-LOVE/Air1 audience grows.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors and/or Associate Degree in the Ministerial or Counseling field from an accredited educational institution.
Licensed and/or Ordained with a recognized Christian church or denomination.
Continuing education to deepen Biblical understanding and leadership knowledge.
